Panda Track Properties

production

Property Description Type Default
environment  Indicates the deployment environment. Valid options are: development, stage, production.  string  development 

accountSetup

Property Description Type Default
defaultAdminPassword  The password to be used for the initial admin user on all new accounts.  string  admin123 
minimumPasswordLength  The minimum number of characters required for a valid password.  integer  5 

paths

Property Description Type Default
sharedPersistentPath  The path to work files that persist across deployment. Use this path for files like; ftp uploads, email attachments, csv uploads and other dynamic content. The contents of this directory are shared across all JVMs so some care needs to be take to avoid collisions. In production, this should be set to an absolute path that is outside of the web root, so that it persists across deployments.  string  /temp/shared/persistent 
sharedTransientPath  The path to work files that persist across deployment. Use this path for files like; ftp uploads, email attachments, csv uploads and other dynamic content. The contents of this directory are shared across all JVMs so some care needs to be take to avoid collisions. In production, this should be set to an absolute path that is outside of the web root, so that it persists across deployments.  string  /temp/shared/transient 

monitoring

Property Description Type Default
contextFormatterEnabled  Determines if the context registry is enabled. If enabled various instances, e.g.: KmCommand, ScAction will store the context (call stack) that the constructs each instance. This can be fairly expensive, but is extremely valuable in debugging the context of slow commands.  boolean  false 
contextFormatterLines  The number of lines to include in each context. If set to a value less than or equal to 0 (e.g.: -1), the full context will be stored.  integer  20 
daoCommandWarningThresholdMs  Dao commands requests that exceed this threshold will be logged as a warning. A value of 0 disables logging.  integer  2000 
sqlWarningThresholdMs  Sql statements that exceed this threshold will be logged as a warning. A value of 0 disables logging.  integer  1000 

email

Property Description Type Default
gmailHost  Connecting to gmail.  string  smtp.gmail.com 
gmailPassword  Connecting to gmail.  string   
gmailPort  Connecting to gmail.  integer  465 
gmailScheme  Connecting to gmail.  string  https 
gmailUser  Connecting to gmail.  string   
sendEmailBatch  The number of emails to send in each batch. Sending batches can be more effecient, but if one email fails it may cause the entire batch fail.  integer  10 
sendEmailEnabled  If false, email sending is completely disabled. The sendEmail job may still run, no email will be sent, and no emails will be marked as sent.  boolean  true 
sendEmailFromAddress  The address that will be listed as the 'from' address.  string  DoNotReply@accucode.com 
sendEmailJobActiveSeconds  The active frquency of the job.  integer  5 
sendEmailJobEnabled  Indicates if the job should be run. Note even if the job is run, that doesn't mean that emails will actually be sent. See also, the sendEmail* properties.  boolean  true 
sendEmailJobIdleSeconds  The idle frquency of the job.  integer  60 
sendEmailMethod  The mechanism used to send emails. Options are: smtp, gmail, print, noop. The default is set to 'print', this must be changed in production. [gmail]: send emails using the gmail passthrough. [print] Use System.out.print to display the contents of the email. [noop]: no action is take (but the email will still be maked as sent; if you don't want the email to be marked as sent, then you must set sendEmailEnabled=false.  string  print 
sendEmailOverrideTo  If set, then force all emails to be sent to this email address rather than the requested recipients. This can be useful for testing.  string   
smtpHost  Connecting to smtp.  string  smtp 
smtpPassword  Connecting to smtp.  string   
smtpPort  Connecting to smtp.  integer  25 
smtpScheme  Connecting to smtp.  string  smtp 
smtpUseSsl  Use SSL when connecting to smtp.  boolean  false 
smtpUser  Connecting to smtp.  string   

servlet

Property Description Type Default
servletHost  This should be set to the appropriate host name. For simple development 'localhost' can typically be used. However, some development and local debugging may need a static IP address.  string   
servletPort  The port number used to serve the servlet requests. Normally left blank, so that it defaults based on the scheme.  string   
servletRedirect  If true, then attempt to redirect users to the appropriate scheme.  boolean  true 
servletScheme  The scheme used. Typically http, though this may also be set to https.  string  http 
writeLastServletResults  If true, the servlet results are written to the web root directory.  boolean  false 
writeLastServletResultsCounter  If true, a counter is appended to the file name so that the results are not overwritten each time.  boolean  false 

serverSession

Property Description Type Default
serverSessionSecure  Indicates if the cookie should be set to require secure transmission (https/ssl).  boolean  false 
serverSessionTimeoutSeconds  The length of time that a session may be idle before it is considered to be automatically stale.  integer  3600 

debug

Property Description Type Default
allowEmptyUserPasswords  Determines if empty/blank passwords should be allowed.  boolean  false 
servletShowStackTrace  Determines if the stack trace should be displayed upon errors. Normally, this is 'false' and the trace is hidden in a comment. For debugging this is usually enabled.  boolean  false 

databaseConnection

Property Description Type Default
databaseDriver  Database connection.  string   
databasePassword  Database connection.  string   
databaseSchema  Database connection.  string   
databaseUri  Database connection.  string   
databaseUser  Database connection.  string   

hibernateSecondLevelCache

Property Description Type Default
hibernateCacheProvider  Hibernate cache provider class.  string   
hibernateCacheTimeSeconds  How long items should remain in the second level cache.  integer  300 
hibernateMemcachedServers  Names of the Memcached Servers, format is :  string   
hibernateUseSecondLevelCache  Use Hibernate second level caching.  boolean  false 

databaseOther

Property Description Type Default
databaseAesPassword  The password used for aes encryption. The password must be exactly 16 characters long. This should be overriden in production.  string  databasePassword 
databaseBatchInsertGroupSize  The number of records that should be inserted at a time when performing batch inserts. The framework provides convenience methods for inserting a list of models. However there are certain database limits on the maximum size of a statement. This parameter automatically takes a batch of arbitrary size and splits it into chunks that the database can handle.  integer  100 
databasePoolingDelayMs  The number of milliseconds between retries when attempting to create a new pooled connection.  integer  100 
databasePoolingEnabled  Determines if local database pooling is enabled. When available, it is better to disable this pooling and use more robust pooling provided by an application server. However, this pooling should still be robust enough for production use.  boolean  true 
databasePoolingRetryCount  This is the number of times that the pooling manager will attempt to create a new connection before throwing an exception.  integer  5 
databaseRowLockFailureRetryCount  The maximum number of times that the system should retry to get a lock.  integer  0 
databaseRowLockFailureRetryMs  The amount of time to wait between retries.  integer  50 
databaseSyncOnStartup  Normally the application will sync the database patches upon startup. Set this to false to disable.  boolean  true 

jobs

Property Description Type Default
csvUploadProcessorJobActiveSeconds  x  integer  10 
csvUploadProcessorJobEnabled  Indicates if the job should be run.  boolean  true 
csvUploadProcessorJobIdleSeconds  x  integer  10 
dataProcessorJobActiveSeconds  The active frquency of the job.  integer  5 
dataProcessorJobEnabled  Indicates if the job should be run. Note even if the job is run, that doesn't mean that emails will actually be sent. See also, the sendEmail* properties.  boolean  true 
dataProcessorJobIdleSeconds  The idle frquency of the job.  integer  60 
deleteOldPerformanceLogsJobActiveSeconds  x  integer  60 
deleteOldPerformanceLogsJobEnabled  Indicates if the job should be run.  boolean  true 
deleteOldPerformanceLogsJobIdleSeconds  x  integer  600 
deleteOldServerSessionsJobActiveSeconds  x  integer  60 
deleteOldServerSessionsJobEnabled  Indicates if the job should be run.  boolean  true 
deleteOldServerSessionsJobIdleSeconds  x  integer  600 
deleteOldSystemLogsJobActiveSeconds  x  integer  60 
deleteOldSystemLogsJobEnabled  Indicates if the job should be run.  boolean  true 
deleteOldSystemLogsJobIdleSeconds  x  integer  600 
log4jReloaderJobActiveSeconds  x  integer  10 
log4jReloaderJobEnabled  Control whether the log4j config file is automatically reloaded during runtime.  boolean  true 
log4jReloaderJobIdleSeconds  x  integer  10 
monitorJobActiveSeconds  x  integer  600 
monitorJobEnabled  Indicates if the job should be run.  boolean  true 
monitorJobIdleSeconds  x  integer  600 
overridesReloaderJobActiveSeconds  x  integer  10 
overridesReloaderJobEnabled  Control whether the Overrides file is automatically reloaded during runtime.  boolean  true 
overridesReloaderJobIdleSeconds  x  integer  10 
performanceLogJobActiveSeconds  x  integer  10 
performanceLogJobEnabled  Indicates if the job should be run.  boolean  true 
performanceLogJobIdleSeconds  x  integer  10 

miscellaneous

Property Description Type Default
ajaxLogDeleteOnStart  If true, the ajax log file is deleted when tomcat starts.  boolean  false 
ajaxLogEnabled  If true, all ScAjaxResults are logged in $webRoot/ajaxLog.txt.  boolean  false 
autoLoginEmail  If not blank, automatically login as this user. Useful for development.  string   
checkRecommendedBrowser  If true, a warning will be display on login if the user is NOT using the recommended browser (firefox).  boolean  false 
defaultTimeZoneCode  The default time zone used for new users.  string  EST-D 
fileUploadRefreshMs  Determines how often the progress bar should update when uploading files.  integer  1000 
ftpEnabled  When disabled, the details of the message will be logged instead of being sent.  boolean  false 
maintenancePeriodEndHour  The end of the daily maintenance window. Value should be in the range [0..23] and corresponds to UTC.  integer  6 
maintenancePeriodStartHour  The start of the daily maintenance window. Value should be in the range [0..23] and corresponds to UTC.  integer  6 
memoryLeakLoopEnabled  Allows you to turn the looping on and off without leaving the page.  boolean  true 
memoryLeakLoopSpeedMs  The speed of the memory leak test page.  integer  0 
showHibernateSql  Tell hibernate to show sql. Requires a restart to take effect.  boolean  false 
synchronizeServletsBySession  This is used to synchronize servlet threads by session.  boolean  true 
webResourceVersioning  This is used to automatically version css and javascript files. none - the version is always set to 'version'. deploy - used in production to include the application version in the path. dev - used in development to change the path each time the app is restarted.  string  static 

googleChart

Property Description Type Default
googleChartHost  Configure the google chart url.  string  chart.apis.google.com 
googleChartPath  Configure the google chart url.  string  chart 
googleChartPort  Configure the google chart url.  integer  80 
googleChartScheme  Configure the google chart url.  string  http 

bootstrap

Property Description Type Default
rootUserEmail  If set, the system will create a default user when bootstrapping the initial database installation.  string
